Code preview of 存储表JBPM4_LOB

drop index IDX_LOB_DEPLOYMENT on JBPM4_LOB;

drop table if exists JBPM4_LOB;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: JBPM4_LOB */
/*==============================================================*/
create table JBPM4_LOB
(
DBID_ bigint not null,
DBVERSION_ integer not null,
BLOB_VALUE_ longblob,
DEPLOYMENT_ bigint,
NAME_ longtext,
INDEX FK_LOB_DEPLOYMENT (DEPLOYMENT_),
primary key (DBID_)
)
type=InnoDB;

alter table JBPM4_LOB comment '存储表
';

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: IDX_LOB_DEPLOYMENT */
/*==============================================================*/
create index IDX_LOB_DEPLOYMENT on JBPM4_LOB
(
DEPLOYMENT_
);
